snippet: The president took part in a panel discussion held at a conference on poverty hosted by Georgetown University.
abstract: Pres Obama takes part in panel discussion before gathering of faith leaders at Georgetown University in which he calls for bipartisan unity on issue of poverty in America; conversation is indication that issue is of increasing importance for his administration.
lead_paragraph: The president took part in a panel discussion held at a conference on poverty hosted by Georgetown University.

headline.main: Obama Urges Liberals and Conservatives to Unite on Poverty
headline.print_headline: Obama Urges Unity in Poverty Fight
